args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- In a metric space, a set S is open iff for every p ∈ S there is an ε > 0 such that the open
ball of radius ε around p is contained in S. -/
variable {α : Type _} [MetricSpace α]

theorem is_open_iff_forall_exists_ball (S : Set α) :
  IsOpen S ↔ ∀ p ∈ S, ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧ Metric.ball p ε ⊆ S := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {α : Type _} [MetricSpace α]

theorem is_open_iff_forall_exists_ball (S : Set α) :
  IsOpen S ↔ ∀ p ∈ S, ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧ Metric.ball p ε ⊆ S := by sorry
